resources.string:
This app downloads the picture from NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day website, apod.nasa.gov.
 Please email me or post to apod.uservoice.com with comments or problems.
 Click on the pictures to get the full list of actions, such as setting wallpaper, etc.
 Swipe left and right on the previous picture details pages for next and previous.
 By default, it runs every day at midnight and automatically sets your homescreen wallpaper, and saves the picture to your SD Card.

 There's also a donate version, with the ads removed, now available!

 If you decide to alter the settings to turn off updates and automatic wallpaper setting, you can still run the update manually

 I try and release updates often, and fix bugs as soon as I can. I hope you enjoy this app!

• Fixed crash on Motorola Xoom!
 • Honeycomb support! Not full tablet UI yet, though.
 • Fix for out of memory crash
